name: SCOR – About
description: Overview and pointers for the SCOR namespace.

values.description: SCOR (Space, Cybersecurity, Operations, and Resilience) is a shared namespace for space security galaxies and clusters (e.g., SPARTA techniques, SPACE-SHIELD tactics/techniques/mitigations). Use SCOR tags to pivot across frameworks.

PCE (Terrestrial/Aerial/Orbital/Deep Space), SEG (Ground/User/Launch/…/Space/Deep Space), SVC (Control/Data/Hybrid), AST (Hardware/Firmware/Software/Data/Signal/Hybrid), AN (IOC/IOA/Threat/Detection/Resilience).
Submit PRs against the SCOR repo. Include IDs, names, descriptions, version, and sources. Keep UUIDs stable.

meta.policy: UUIDs immutable; bump cluster version on content change
